snippet: A federal appeals court ordered a lower court judge to reconsider his interpretation of a settlement with claimants who filed billions of dollars of claims against BP after the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill disaster.
abstract: Federal appeals court orders United States District Court Judge Carl J Barbier to reconsider his interpretation of a settlement with claimants who filed billions of dollars of claims against BP after the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill disaster; order is partial victory for oil company.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court ordered a lower court judge to reconsider his interpretation of a settlement with claimants who filed billions of dollars of claims against BP after the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill disaster.

headline.main: Partial Victory for BP in Dispute Over Settlement
headline.print_headline: Partial Victory for BP in Dispute Over Settlement
